alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 5:53PM EST until February 26 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia...Tennessee... West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Hamilton and Catoosa Counties. Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. For the North GA Chickamauga Creek Basin...including Fort Oglethorpe, Ringgold...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and forecast to continue. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding expands into the pastures... fields and woodlands upstream and downstream from the Keiths Mill Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 17.9 feet and steady. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 PM EST Thursday was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet this evening. It will then forecast to fall below flood stage by late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
